title: Russian bobsledder disqualified for doping
text:
Russian bobsledder disqualified for doping 1:34pm EST - 01:06 
Russian bobsledder Nadezhda Sergeeva has admitted an anti-doping violation and has been disqualified from the Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang, according to the Court of Arbitration for Sport.   
Russian bobsledder Nadezhda Sergeeva has admitted an anti-doping violation and has been disqualified from the Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang, according to the Court of Arbitration for Sport.  //reut.rs/2CJAp60
